mapper.insert: insert into notice (noticeTitle, noticeCon, noticeRegdate, noticeCat) values (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeCon}, #{noticeRegdate},#{noticeCat})
mapper.select: select noticeId, noticeTitle, noticeCon, noticeRegdate, noticeCat from Notice where noticeId = #{noticeId}
select noticeId, noticeTitle, noticeCon, noticeRegdate, noticeCat from Notice where noticeId > 0 order by noticeId desc, noticeRegdate desc

select noticeid, noticetitle, noticecon, noticeregdate, noticecat from (select rownum rnum, noticeid, noticetitle, noticecon, noticeregdate, noticecat from (select * from notice where noticeId > 0
order by noticeid desc)) where rnum between #{pageStart} and #{pageStart}+9
select count(noticeId) from Notice where noticeId > 0
